title: Mergers: Commission approves acquisition of Com Hem by Tele2
snippet: The European Commission has approved unconditionally, under the EU Merger Regulation, the proposed acquisition of Com Hem by Tele2. The Commission concluded that the transaction would raise no competition concerns as the companies\' activities ...

title: The merger between Tele2 and Com Hem is completed - Tele2
snippet: Com Hem shareholders will receive the Tele2 shares i.e. the non-cash merger consideration on November 7, 2018 and the cash merger consideration on November 7-8, 2018. Trading in the Tele2 share takes place as usual and will not be affected by the merger process...

title: Tele2 and Com Hem merger - Tele2
snippet: The merger between Tele2 and Com Hem was completed on 5 November 2018. Com Hem Holding was dissolved and all of its assets and liabilities were transferred to Tele2. ... This website uses cookies to provide the best possible user experience.

title: The European Commission has approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem - Inderes
snippet: Today the European Commission approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem unconditionally. The merger will combine two highly cash generative businesses with clear synergies to create a leading integrated connectivity provider in the Baltic Sea region.

title: The European Commission has approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem - Tele2
